sig_info: When below 40% of max health, getting struck by a Contact Attack has a 10 to 50% chance to activate Sasquatch’s healing factor, Passively Regenerating 5% of missing health over 20 seconds. Max stacks 3.
During Wrath of Tanaraq, Sasquatch becomes Passively Unstoppable during Special and Heavy Attacks and the Opponent’s Defensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 10 to 50% when struck by these Attacks.
